description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Esoterica America is an exciting mystery that weaves together the world of secret societies, esoteric literature, and personal and collective enlightenment. Sam, the son of a venerable Illuminati, goes on a search to uncover the truth behind his father's disappearance. Along the way, Sam encounters different lodges, different philosophies, and even different species.
